name: Hard Drive Havoc
description:
Hard Drive Havoc is a game in which you are an AI that can install and delete games from a hard drive. Your job is to make sure the correct games are installed at the right time. As your master plays a game, the next game he wants to play will become more clear. If you make too many mistakes or make him wait too long he may think about replacing you.

Music by GreyScreen (Kevin Stebner)

greyscreen.bandcamp.com
